import api from "../utils/Api" function Main({onEditProfile, onAddPlace, onEditAvatar}) { [userName, setUserName] = React.useState('') [userDescription, setUserDescription] = React.useState('') [userAvatar, setUserAvatar] = React.useState('') React.useEffect(() => { api.getProfileInfo .then(res => { console.log(res) }) } ) return (

{userName}

{userDescription}

) } export default Main
